prompts: Create a cute Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a small round creature with big ears.
I want a whimsical Pokemon design featuring a round body and expressive eyes.
Generate an adorable creature that has soft purple fur and a playful personality.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of sound, with features symbolizing music and joy.
Imagine a Pokemon with oversized ears that can amplify sound waves and create echoes.
Design a small, chubby Pokemon that loves to play in grassy fields and wooded areas.
Show me a Pokemon that appears timid yet has a cheerful disposition, perfect for kids.
